title: About
text:
This blog is dedicated to taking handwritten notes, or any element and aspect related to it.
It is a love letter, maybe even a memoir, about the art, science, practice, and joy of taking notes.
The blog’s title is inspired by Stephen King’s on Writing and Willian Zinsser’s On Writing Well.
Written and rendered with Supernote Built and published with Quarto Writing emoticon copied from looks.wtf.


ReuseCC BY 4.0
